artist: Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: Folded sheet from fashion periodical (P.15,562); woman at left in a pale blue gown with a white shawl and a white and red hat with a bow; woman at right in an olive-green gown with a white hat with a bow at the front
portfolio: From Journal de la Mode et du Goût, ou amusemens du salon et de la toilette, Paris, 1790–92
title: Fashion plate from Journal de la Mode et du Goût, Vingt-neuvième Cahier, 5 Décembre 1790
